title: Keen 5 lowscore
content:
Hello,

I remember some time back there was a thread about getting the lowest score possible in keen 5, but it seems to be gone now. Anyone knows where it went, or does anyone have a list, since I'm curious what scores other people can get.

title: Re: Keen 5 lowscore
content:
Zero.


That's the lowest score you can get...


As for trying to get a low score... I could go very low.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I've changed a lot since my last time on this forum...

title: Re: Keen 5 lowscore
content: It would be more than zero... Obviously if you finished the game you would be walked into at least 1 point.

title: Re: Keen 5 lowscore
content:
Easy: just jump into that sparky in level one a couple of times in a row. Game over, no score.

Actually completing the game without scoring any points, I haven't tried it. The thread probably died in the hack. I don't rememeber anything about Keen 5, but there was plenty of discussion about Keen 6 IIRK.

Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Keen 5 lowscore
content:
Yeah, it seems my memory was almost correct -- it was correct in the sense that you can't get Keen 5 completed without collecting any points, but far off in 'a few points', as it took me 33200 points to complete it! There's only two levels where one can avoid getting any points, I think. It took a lot load and saves as I tried to get past everything with many attempts.. I played one easy. I also tried to avoid collecting vitalin but picked up 40 of that nevertheless. I didn't visit the secret level.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Keen 5 lowscore
content: i dont think vitalin goes towards your points. Also are you sure you finished the whole game with only 30,000? not 300,000?

title: Re:  Re: Keen 5 lowscore

33200.. But anyways, why not? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img] Not every level has points placed like in Security Center! title: well...
content:
You're forced into quite a number of points in the Security Center, just because of the way points are distributed. In many levels, points line the ceiling or are otherwise "out of the way," asking the player to jump/pogo/maneuver to obtain them... Security Center just lines the halls with points, making a low score on this particular level impossible.

Look at [url=http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/encyclopedia/maps/maps-k5-lvl02.html]the map[/url] of the level... there's chocolate milk EVERYWHERE you need to be. And you can't get the blue keygem without collecting at least two marshmellows!
